data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Zhoushan, Zhejiang, China so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhoushan, Zhejiang, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Zhoushan, Zhejiang, China to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary: On average, 13 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Zhoushan, Zhejiang, China.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Zhoushan.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Zhoushan you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the She people. Make the She people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Zhoushan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Zhoushan that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 13,647 believers in Zhoushan to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

location.name: Zhoushan
location.people_groups_list: Deaf, Han Chinese, Min Bei, Han Chinese, Wu, Han Chinese, Huizhou
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deaf (7,196,000), Han Chinese, Min Bei (3,008,000), Han Chinese, Wu (95,092,000), Han Chinese, Huizhou (5,395,000)
